Einstein Replies

Einstein Service Replies for Chat
Set Up Service Replies for Chat
Service Cloud Features

You are here:

Salesforce Help | Docs | Service Cloud | Service Replies for Chat Usage and Tracking

Service Replies charges only for the activity you use. Learn how your agents interact with Einstein generative AI and track your usage against your subscription allowance.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

For each generative AI feature, agent usage depends on the size of the request and the number of requests. For Service Replies for Chat:

The request size depends on the length of the customer conversation, so a longer conversation creates a larger request. Einstein considers only the previous 20 chat messages for each request.

A request is created for each customer or agent turn in a conversation.

EXAMPLE

A customer contacts your support team to reset their password.

Customer: Hi, I’m locked out of my account and need to reset my password.
Agent: Hello, I can help with that! What is the email associated with your account?
...
In this scenario the request size and frequency both contribute to usage. This case created seven requests, corresponding to each conversation turn.

Only agents who have the Service Replies User permission set contribute to your usage.

To learn more or get updates on your Service Replies usage, contact your Salesforce account executive.

Let us know so we can improve!

No
title: Service Cloud Usage and Tracking
